attributes.action: stop all but essental immigration to the UK with a preference to training our own
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that it has been statistically proven by 'Migration Watch UK' that the direct benefit to the UK for each immigrant is more or less 'One Mars Bar a Month' not taken into account indirects like terrorism, cohesion etc, and that most immigrants coming here nowadays are joining existing extended immigrant families, predominately do not speak English, and are more likely to be and burden to society and resorting to public funds and sevices.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
